  • Classes in com.binance4j.market.param used by com.binance4j.market.client
    Class
    Description
    AggTradeParams
    The parameters to get compressed, aggregate trades.
    AveragePriceParams

    The parameters to get the the best price/quantity on the order book for a symbol or symbols.
    BookTickersParams
    The parameters to get the the best price/quantity on the order book for the given symbols.

    The parameters to retrieve the exchange trading rules and symbol information

    The parameters to get the historical trades of a trading pair
